text: Sorry if I did the wrong thing by responding directly to Ryan without reviewing internally first, but I figured if he didn't get something this morning, he might haunt us all day...
i emailed him directly without all cc'd.
thanks for the response, the more info for ryan the better! thanks again.
thanks for responding right to him :grinning: cool
figured i'd keep everyone's email slim
but can cc all if that's less confusing.
cool on all fronts. I was similarly worried about potential silence. I think he'll do well with overcommunication at this point, so happy to hear we're in active touch. Thanks
I uploaded 2 new APKs. Press+hold has been implemented, as well as the following changes to both press+hold and voicenotev2:
System nav bar is dimmed instead of immersive fullscreen mode (similar to native Camera app)
Preview auto-dismisses after 3 seconds if user doesn't touch the Share or Delete icons
Aspect ratio should look better on both wide and narrow screens (tested on Nexus 5 wide and S5 narrow)

... Since we're now maintaining 2 branches, any single change takes 2x time to implement, because I have to visually test and adjust almost every item in each layout. It's no problem, just wanted to make a note of it. Have a great weekend!
